meanings.sent1: The movie was so boring that I fell asleep.
meanings.sent2: The lecture was boring, and many students struggled to stay awake.
meanings.sent3: The boring book made me yawn every few pages.
meanings.sent4: The gray, boring sky matched the monotony of the day.

meanings.definition: Causing feelings of weariness or impatience
meanings.sent1: The long, boring meeting drained everyone's energy.
meanings.sent2: Waiting in the never-ending line was so boring.
meanings.sent3: The boring wait for the bus felt like an eternity.
meanings.sent4: The boring routine of daily chores became unbearable.
meanings.sent5: The boring journey through the desert seemed to last forever.
